remarks: Show that an unordered pair is a valid edge in a graph.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2016.)
statement:
vdeg0i.v $e |- V e. _V $.
umgrabi.4 $e |- X e. V $.
umgrabi.5 $e |- Y e. V $.
umgrabi $p |- ( ph -> { X , Y } e. { x e. ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) | ( # ` x ) <_ 2 } ) $.
$d V x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
